active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group of 3-4, debate the trade-offs of implementing strict automated security gates in a fast-paced API DevSecOps environment: How do they balance security velocity vs. developer productivity? Cite examples from OWASP Top 10 mitigations and propose optimizations (10-15 minutes, followed by class share-out).
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Application Security and API DevSecOps. Generate high-quality, spaced-repetition-optimized flashcards for the topic 'Automated Security Gates' (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > 008_Application Security > 006_API Security > 007_API Lifecycle Security > DevSecOps for APIs > Automated Security Gates). Incorporate: - Learning objectives: [PASTE FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] - Active learning: Use prompts to inspire scenario flashcards. - Scaffolding: Distribute cards across 4 layers [PASTE FULL SCAFFOLDING FROM ABOVE]. - Research context: Automated gates as SDLC checkpoints (AppSec, CI/CD integration, OWASP ASVS, ISO/IEC 27034 for app sec). Examples: SAST/DAST/SCA for OWASP Top 10 in APIs. Follow flashcard schema exactly [PASTE FULL SCHEMA FROM ABOVE]. Output 75 flashcards as a JSON array: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'distractors': ['opt1', 'opt2', 'opt3'], 'metadata': {...}}, 'type': 'MCQ/cloze/etc.'}, ...]. Ensure verifiability with hyperlinks (e.g., OWASP: https://owasp.org/www-project-asvs/, ISO: https://www.iso.org/standard/75119.html). Balance for active recall, avoid rote memorization.
